title: I Take Care of Everyone But Myself - Part 2
description:
Dr. Laura helps Jennifer come up with a way to be compassionate with herself without running away from her husband and kids. Dr. Laura: "Change today and all your tomorrows with sweet requests and guidance for what you need."

When did you start becoming compassionate towards yourself? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. Become a Dr. Laura Family Member: https://www.drlaura.com/ See https://www.drlaura.com/privacy-policy for privacy information.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
